titles.title: Caring for an Aging America Act
A bill to include geriatrics and gerontology in the definition of "primary health services" under the National Health Service Corps program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 5/26/2011--Introduced. Caring for an Aging America Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to include geriatrics and gerontology within the definition of "primary health services" for purposes of the National Health Service Corps.
